EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Agile Series #1 - US - 2014.08.14.Email - Miss You - US
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at our webinar: Testing at the Speed of Agile
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Agile Webinar Series: Testing at the Speed of Agile
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
We’re sorry we missed you at our webinar, “Testing at the Speed of Agile.” We enjoyed listening to Diego Lo Giudice, Vice President and Principal Analyst at Forrester Research, discussing how Agile testing practices are key to delivering applications fast and with high levels of quality.
Lively questions and dialogue from our audience only improved the experience. Join us for the next webinars in our series:
Agile Testing Webinar #2 August 26, 2014 10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m. PDT (1:00 p.m. – 2:00 p.m. EDT) Toto, We’re Not in Kansas Anymore: One Company’s Journey to Quality Featuring Megan Maloney, QA Manager, IT Solution Delivery , CFA Institute
Agile Testing Webinar #3 September 9, 2014 10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m. PDT (1:00 p.m. – 2:00 p.m. EDT) Automate Agile Testing with Tricentis Tosca Testsuite With Roman Zednik, Tricentis
Click here <http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-agile-series-2-us-2014-08-26.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal> to register for Webinar #2.
Want to see what you missed? Check out the slides from the webcast at http://www.slideshare.net/tricentis <http://www.slideshare.net/tricentis>.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Diego Lo Giudice Vice President and Principal Analyst Forrester Research
Wolfgang Platz Founder & Chief Product Officer Tricentis
